original: 此經能照諸天宮殿，是經能與眾生快樂，是經能令地獄、餓鬼、畜生諸河焦乾枯竭，是經能除一切怖畏，是經能却他方怨賊，是經能除穀貴饑饉，是經能愈一切疫病，是經能滅惡星變異，是經能除一切憂惱。
analyzed: 此經能照諸天宮殿，是經能與眾生快樂，是經能令地獄、餓鬼、畜生諸河焦乾枯竭，是經能除一切怖畏，是經能却他方怨賊，是經能除穀貴饑饉，是經能愈一切疫病，是經能滅惡星變異，是經能除一切憂惱。
translated: This sūtra can illuminate the palaces of the devas, this sūtra can bestow happiness on sentient beings, this sūtra can cause the rivers of hell, hungry ghosts, and animals to dry up and disappear, this sūtra can eliminate all fears, this sūtra can ward off enemies from other lands, this sūtra can eliminate the scarcity of grain and famine, this sūtra can cure all epidemics, this sūtra can destroy the strange phenomena of evil stars, this sūtra can remove all worries and anxieties.

original: 舉要言之，是經能滅一切眾生無量無邊百千苦惱。
analyzed: 舉要言之，是經能滅一切眾生無量無邊百千苦惱。
translated: In brief, this sūtra can eliminate the immeasurable and boundless hundreds of thousands of sufferings of all sentient beings.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是金光明微妙經典，若在大眾廣宣說時，我等四王及餘眷屬，聞此甘露無上法味，增益身力心進勇銳具諸威德。

translated: When this subtle and wonderful Golden Light Sūtra is being widely proclaimed in the great assembly, when we, the Four Heavenly Kings and the rest of our retinue, hear this nectar-like unsurpassed Dharma flavor, it will increase our physical strength, invigorate our minds, and endow us with all majestic virtues.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我等四王，能說正法修行正法，為世法王以法治世。
analyzed: 我等四王，能說正法修行正法，為世法王以法治世。
translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings, can expound the true Dharma, practice the true Dharma, and become Dharma Kings who rule the world with the Dharma.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我等四王及天、龍、鬼神、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽，以法治世，遮諸惡鬼噉精氣者。

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我等四王二十八部諸鬼神等，及無量百千鬼神，以淨天眼過於人眼，常觀擁護此閻浮提。
analyzed: 我等四王二十八部諸鬼神等，及無量百千鬼神，以淨天眼過於人眼，常觀擁護此閻浮提。
translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings, the twenty-eight divisions of spirits, and countless hundreds of thousands of spirits, with our pure heavenly eyes surpassing human eyes, always observe and protect this Jambudvīpa.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是故我等名護世王。
analyzed: 是故我等名護世王。

original: 若此國土有諸衰耗、怨賊侵境、饑饉疾疫種種艱難，若有比丘受持是經，我等四王當共勸請，令是比丘以我力故，疾往彼所國邑郡縣，廣宣流布是金光明微妙經典，令如是等種種百千衰耗之事悉皆滅盡。
analyzed: 若此國土有諸衰耗、怨賊侵境、饑饉疾疫種種艱難，若有比丘受持是經，我等四王當共勸請，令是比丘以我力故，疾往彼所國邑郡縣，廣宣流布是金光明微妙經典，令如是等種種百千衰耗之事悉皆滅盡。
translated: If there are any calamities, invasions by hostile forces, famine, or epidemic diseases in this country, if there are bhikṣus who uphold this sūtra, we, the Four Heavenly Kings, will all together encourage and request that bhikṣu to quickly go to those countries, towns, counties, and prefectures, and widely proclaim and spread this subtle and wonderful Golden Light Sūtra, causing all such various hundreds of thousands of calamities to be completely eliminated.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 如諸國王所有土境，是持經者若至其國，是王應當往是人所，聽受如是微妙經典，聞已歡喜，復當護念恭敬是人。
analyzed: 如諸國王所有土境，是持經者若至其國，是王應當往是人所，聽受如是微妙經典，聞已歡喜，復當護念恭敬是人。
translated: If the kings of various countries have territories, if the upholders of this sūtra go to their countries, those kings should go to those people and listen to and accept this subtle and wonderful sūtra. Having heard it with joy, they should further protect, think of, and respectfully serve those people.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings, will further diligently protect that king and the people of the country, removing calamities and enabling them to attain peace and security.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷受持是經，若諸人王有能供給施其所安，我等四王，亦當令是王及國人民一切安隱具足無患。
analyzed: 若有比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷受持是經，若諸人王有能供給施其所安，我等四王，亦當令是王及國人民一切安隱具足無患。
translated: If there are bhikṣus, bhikṣuṇīs, upāsakas, and upāsikās who uphold this sūtra, and if the kings of the various countries are able to provide them with comfort and ease, we, the Four Heavenly Kings, will also cause the kings and the people of the country to all be at ease, replete, and free from calamity.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有四眾受持讀誦是妙經典，若諸人王有能供養恭敬尊重讚歎；
analyzed: 若有四眾受持讀誦是妙經典，若諸人王有能供養恭敬尊重讚歎；
translated: If there are the fourfold assembly who uphold and recite this marvelous sūtra, and if the kings of the various countries are able to make offerings, respect, venerate, and praise them;

original: 我等四王，亦復當令如是人王，於諸王中常得第一供養恭敬尊重讚歎，亦令餘王欽尚羨慕稱讚其善。
analyzed: 我等四王，亦復當令如是人王，於諸王中常得第一供養恭敬尊重讚歎，亦令餘王欽尚羨慕稱讚其善。
translated: we, the Four Heavenly Kings, will also cause such kings to always obtain the foremost offerings, respect, veneration, and praise among all kings, and will also cause the other kings to admire, envy, and praise their goodness.

original: 」爾時世尊讚歎護世四天王等：
analyzed: 」爾時世尊讚歎護世四天王等：
translated: At that time the World-Honored One praised the Four Heavenly Kings who protect the world, saying:

original: 「善哉，善哉！
analyzed: 「善哉，善哉！
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: 汝等四王，過去已曾供養恭敬尊重讚歎無量百千萬億諸佛，於諸佛所種諸善根，說於正法修行正法，以法治世為人天王。
analyzed: 汝等四王，過去已曾供養恭敬尊重讚歎無量百千萬億諸佛，於諸佛所種諸善根，說於正法修行正法，以法治世為人天王。
translated: You four kings have in the past already made offerings, paid respects, revered, and praised innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of millions of buddhas, planted various roots of goodness in the presence of those buddhas, expounded the true Dharma and practiced the true Dharma, and governed the world with the Dharma as a human king and heavenly king.

original: 汝等今日長夜利益於諸眾生，行大悲心，施與眾生一切樂具，能遮諸惡勤與諸善。
analyzed: 汝等今日長夜利益於諸眾生，行大悲心，施與眾生一切樂具，能遮諸惡勤與諸善。
translated: You all today for a long time benefit sentient beings, practice the mind of great compassion, give sentient beings all the requisites for happiness, and are able to stop all evil and diligently give all that is good.

original: 以是義故，若有人王能供養恭敬此金光明微妙經典，汝等正應如是護念，滅其苦惱與其安樂。
analyzed: 以是義故，若有人王能供養恭敬此金光明微妙經典，汝等正應如是護念，滅其苦惱與其安樂。
translated: For this reason, if there is a king who is able to make offerings and pay respects to this subtle and wonderful Golden Light Sutra, you should properly protect and think of him like this, extinguish his suffering and give him peace and happiness.

original: 「汝等四王及諸眷屬、無量無邊百千鬼神，若能護念如是經者，即是護持去來現在諸佛正法。
analyzed: 「汝等四王及諸眷屬、無量無邊百千鬼神，若能護念如是經者，即是護持去來現在諸佛正法。
translated: You four kings and your innumerable hundreds of thousands of retinues and ghosts and spirits, if you are able to protect and think of this sutra, then you are protecting and upholding the true Dharma of all buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: 汝等四王及餘天眾百千鬼神，與阿脩羅共戰鬪時，汝等諸天常得勝利。
analyzed: 汝等四王及餘天眾百千鬼神，與阿脩羅共戰鬪時，汝等諸天常得勝利。
translated: You, the Four Heavenly Kings, and the other heavenly beings, hundreds of thousands of ghosts and spirits, when engaged in battle with the asuras, the heavenly beings always gain victory.

original: 汝等若能護念此經，悉能消伏一切諸苦，所謂怨賊饑饉疾疫。
analyzed: 汝等若能護念此經，悉能消伏一切諸苦，所謂怨賊饑饉疾疫。
translated: If you are able to protect and uphold this sūtra, you will be able to eliminate all sufferings, namely, enemies, famine, and pestilence.

original: 若四部眾有能受持讀誦此經，汝等亦應勤心守護，為除衰惱施與安樂。
analyzed: 若四部眾有能受持讀誦此經，汝等亦應勤心守護，為除衰惱施與安樂。
translated: If the fourfold assembly is able to receive, uphold, read and recite this sūtra, you should also diligently protect them, remove their afflictions, and bestow peace and happiness upon them.

original: 」爾時四王復白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時四王復白佛言：
translated: At that time, the Four Heavenly Kings again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是金光明微妙經典，於未來世在所流布，若國土城邑郡縣村落隨所至處，若諸國王以天律治世，復能恭敬至心聽受是妙經典，并復尊重供養供給持是經典四部之眾，以是因緣，我等時時得聞如是微妙經典，聞已即得增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
analyzed: 是金光明微妙經典，於未來世在所流布，若國土城邑郡縣村落隨所至處，若諸國王以天律治世，復能恭敬至心聽受是妙經典，并復尊重供養供給持是經典四部之眾，以是因緣，我等時時得聞如是微妙經典，聞已即得增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
translated: Wherever this subtle and wonderful Golden Light Sutra spreads in the future, whether in countries, cities, counties, or villages, if the kings of those countries rule the world with the heavenly law and are able to respectfully and wholeheartedly listen to and accept this wonderful sutra, and also revere and make offerings to the four groups of people who uphold this sutra, for these causes and conditions, we will from time to time be able to hear such subtle and wonderful sutras. Having heard them, we will immediately gain increased physical strength, mental progress, and possess all majestic virtues.

original: 是故我等及無量鬼神，常當隱形隨其妙典所流布處，而作擁護令無留難；
analyzed: 是故我等及無量鬼神，常當隱形隨其妙典所流布處，而作擁護令無留難；
translated: Therefore, we and innumerable spirits will always conceal our forms and follow wherever this wonderful sutra spreads, and we will provide protection to prevent obstacles;

original: 亦當護念聽是經典諸國王等及其人民，除其患難悉令安隱，他方怨賊亦使退散。
analyzed: 亦當護念聽是經典諸國王等及其人民，除其患難悉令安隱，他方怨賊亦使退散。
translated: We will also think of protecting the kings of those countries who listen to this sutra and their people, removing their troubles and making them all peaceful and secure, and causing the enemy troops from other directions to retreat and disperse.

original: 若有人王聽是經時，隣國怨敵興如是念：
analyzed: 若有人王聽是經時，隣國怨敵興如是念：
translated: If a king listens to this sutra, the hostile neighboring countries will think like this:

original: 『當具四兵壞彼國土。
analyzed: 『當具四兵壞彼國土。
translated: 'We will assemble the four divisions of our army to destroy that country.'

original: 』世尊！
analyzed: 』世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 以是經典威神力故，爾時隣敵更有異怨為作留難，於其境界起諸衰惱災異疫病。
analyzed: 以是經典威神力故，爾時隣敵更有異怨為作留難，於其境界起諸衰惱災異疫病。
translated: By the majestic power of this sutra, at that time, the neighboring enemy will have other adversaries create obstacles for them, and various calamities, disasters, and epidemics will arise in their territory.

original: 爾時怨敵起如是等諸惡事已，備具四兵，發向是國規往討罰。
analyzed: 爾時怨敵起如是等諸惡事已，備具四兵，發向是國規往討罰。
translated: At that time, the enemy will give rise to such evil events as these, and will assemble the four divisions of their army, and set out towards that country with the intention of attacking and punishing them.

original: 我等爾時，當與眷屬無量無邊百千鬼神，隱蔽其形為作護助，令彼怨敵自然退散，起諸怖懅種種留難。
analyzed: 我等爾時，當與眷屬無量無邊百千鬼神，隱蔽其形為作護助，令彼怨敵自然退散，起諸怖懅種種留難。
translated: At that time, we will, together with our retinues, countless hundreds of thousands of ghosts and spirits, conceal our forms and protect and assist them, causing those enemies to naturally retreat and scatter, giving rise to various fears and obstacles.

original: 彼國兵眾尚不能到，況復當能有所破壞？
analyzed: 彼國兵眾尚不能到，況復當能有所破壞？
translated: The armies of that country will not even be able to reach them, let alone be able to destroy anything.

original: 」爾時佛讚四天王等：
analyzed: 」爾時佛讚四天王等：
translated: At that time, the Buddha praised the Four Heavenly Kings and the others, saying:

original: 「善哉，善哉！
analyzed: 「善哉，善哉！
translated: Excellent, excellent!

original: 汝等四王，乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王受持是經恭敬供養者，為消衰患令其安樂；
analyzed: 汝等四王，乃能擁護我百千億那由他劫所可修習阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，及諸人王受持是經恭敬供養者，為消衰患令其安樂；
translated: You, the Four Heavenly Kings, are able to protect those who cultivate anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhi for hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of kalpas, as well as the kings of humans who uphold this sūtra and make offerings with respect, in order to eliminate their misfortunes and bring them peace and happiness;

original: 復能擁護宮殿舍宅城邑村落國土邊疆，乃至怨賊悉令退散，滅其衰惱令得安隱，亦令一切閻浮提內所有諸王無諸凶衰鬪訟之事。

translated: You are also able to protect palaces, houses, cities, villages, countries, borders, and even enemies, causing them all to retreat and scatter, eliminating their misfortunes and bringing them peace and security, and also causing all the kings within Jambudvīpa to have no calamities or disputes.

original: 「四王當知，此閻浮提八萬四千城邑聚落、八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國娛樂快樂，各各於國而得自在；
analyzed: 「四王當知，此閻浮提八萬四千城邑聚落、八萬四千諸人王等，各於其國娛樂快樂，各各於國而得自在；
translated: The Four Heavenly Kings should know that in Jambudvīpa, there are eighty-four thousand cities, towns, and villages, and eighty-four thousand kings of humans, each enjoying happiness in their own country, each having sovereignty in their own country;

original: 於自所有錢財珍寶，各各自足不相侵奪；

analyzed: 如其宿世所修集業隨業受報，不生惡心貪求他國；
translated: According to the karma they cultivated in their past lives, they received their karmic retribution. They did not give rise to evil thoughts or greedily seek other countries;

original: 各各自生利益之心，生於慈心、安樂之心、不諍訟心、不破壞心、無繫縛心、無楚撻心，各於其土自生愛樂，上下和睦猶如水乳，心相愛念增諸善根。
analyzed: 各各自生利益之心，生於慈心、安樂之心、不諍訟心、不破壞心、無繫縛心、無楚撻心，各於其土自生愛樂，上下和睦猶如水乳，心相愛念增諸善根。
translated: Each gave rise to a mind of benefit, a mind of kindness, a mind of peace and joy, a mind free from disputes and destruction, a mind free from bondage and punishment, and a mind of self-enjoyment in their own lands. The upper and lower classes were harmonious like water and milk, and they cherished each other with loving thoughts, increasing their roots of goodness.

original: 以是因緣故，此閻浮提安隱豐樂，人民熾盛大地沃壤，陰陽調和時不越序，日月星宿不失常度，風雨隨時無諸災橫，人民豐實自足於財，心無貪吝亦無嫉妬，等行十善，其人壽終多生天上，天宮充滿增益天眾。
analyzed: 以是因緣故，此閻浮提安隱豐樂，人民熾盛大地沃壤，陰陽調和時不越序，日月星宿不失常度，風雨隨時無諸災橫，人民豐實自足於財，心無貪吝亦無嫉妬，等行十善，其人壽終多生天上，天宮充滿增益天眾。
translated: For this reason, this Jambudvīpa was peaceful and prosperous, with a flourishing population. The great earth was fertile, the yin and yang were in harmony, the seasons did not go out of order, the sun, moon, and stars did not deviate from their regular courses, the wind and rain came at the proper times, and there were no calamities or disasters. The people were prosperous and self-sufficient in wealth. Their minds were free from greed and jealousy, and they practiced the ten wholesome deeds equally. When their lives ended, many were reborn in the heavens, filling the heavenly palaces and increasing the heavenly multitudes.

original: 「若未來世有諸人王聽是經典，及供養恭敬受持是經四部之眾，是王則為安樂利益汝等四王及餘眷屬無量百千諸鬼神等。
analyzed: 「若未來世有諸人王聽是經典，及供養恭敬受持是經四部之眾，是王則為安樂利益汝等四王及餘眷屬無量百千諸鬼神等。
translated: If in the future there are kings who listen to this sutra, and make offerings and pay respect to the four groups of people who uphold this sutra, then this king will bring peace, happiness, and benefit to you four kings, your retinues, and the innumerable hundreds of thousands of spirits.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 汝等四王，若得時時聞是經典，則為已得正法之水，服甘露味增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
analyzed: 汝等四王，若得時時聞是經典，則為已得正法之水，服甘露味增益身力，心進勇銳具諸威德。
translated: You four kings, if you can from time to time hear this sutra, then you will have already obtained the water of the true Dharma, tasted the flavor of immortality, and increased the power of your bodies, with minds full of vigor and possessing all majestic virtues.

original: 是諸人王，若能至心聽受是經，則為已能供養於我。
analyzed: 是諸人王，若能至心聽受是經，則為已能供養於我。
translated: If these kings are able to listen to this sutra with utmost sincerity, then they will have already made offerings to me.

original: 若供養我，則是供養過去未來現在諸佛；
analyzed: 若供養我，則是供養過去未來現在諸佛；
translated: If they make offerings to me, then they will be making offerings to the buddhas of the past, future, and present;

original: 若能供養過去未來現在諸佛，則得無量不可思議功德之聚。
analyzed: 若能供養過去未來現在諸佛，則得無量不可思議功德之聚。

May the protective deities of their homes increase their majestic virtue and also experience immeasurable joy and happiness.

original: 是諸國土所有人民，悉受種種五欲之樂，一切惡事悉皆消滅。
analyzed: 是諸國土所有人民，悉受種種五欲之樂，一切惡事悉皆消滅。
translated: May the people of these countries all enjoy various kinds of the five sense pleasures, and may all evil events be completely eliminated.

original: 」爾時四天王白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時四天王白佛言：

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

original: 未來之世若有人王，欲得護身及后妃婇女諸王子等宮殿屋宅，得第一護身所王領最為殊勝，具不可思議王者功德；
analyzed: 未來之世若有人王，欲得護身及后妃婇女諸王子等宮殿屋宅，得第一護身所王領最為殊勝，具不可思議王者功德；
translated: In the future, if there are kings who wish to protect themselves, their consorts, court ladies, princes, and the palaces and residences, and obtain the foremost protection for their bodies and the most distinguished leadership over their kingdoms, endowed with inconceivable merit as a king;

original: 欲得攝取無量福聚，國土無有他方怨賊，無諸憂惱及諸苦事。
analyzed: 欲得攝取無量福聚，國土無有他方怨賊，無諸憂惱及諸苦事。
translated: who wish to gather immeasurable blessings and have no enemies from other lands in their country, and be free from all worries, afflictions, and painful events.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 如是人王，不應放逸散亂其心，應生恭敬謙下之心，應當莊嚴第一微妙最勝宮宅，種種香汁持用灑地，散種種華，敷大法座師子之座，兼以無量珍琦異物而為校飾，張施種種無數微妙幢幡寶蓋；
analyzed: 如是人王，不應放逸散亂其心，應生恭敬謙下之心，應當莊嚴第一微妙最勝宮宅，種種香汁持用灑地，散種種華，敷大法座師子之座，兼以無量珍琦異物而為校飾，張施種種無數微妙幢幡寶蓋；
translated: Such a king should not be negligent or distracted, but should give rise to a respectful and humble mind. original: 當淨洗浴以香塗身，著好淨衣纓絡自嚴，坐卑小座不自高大，除去自在離諸放逸，謙下自卑除去驕慢，正念聽受如是妙典，於說法者生世尊想；
analyzed: 當淨洗浴以香塗身，著好淨衣纓絡自嚴，坐卑小座不自高大，除去自在離諸放逸，謙下自卑除去驕慢，正念聽受如是妙典，於說法者生世尊想；
translated: He should bathe and anoint his body with fragrance, wear clean and beautiful clothes, adorn himself with necklaces, sit on a low and small seat without being arrogant, remove self-indulgence, avoid all negligence, humble himself and remove arrogance, listen to and accept this wonderful sutra with right mindfulness, and give rise to the thought of the World-Honored One towards the Dharma teacher.

original: 復於宮內后妃王子婇女眷屬，生慈哀心和顏與語，勸以種種供養之具供養法師。
analyzed: 復於宮內后妃王子婇女眷屬，生慈哀心和顏與語，勸以種種供養之具供養法師。
translated: Moreover, towards the consorts, princes, court ladies, and retinue in the palace, he should give rise to a compassionate mind, speak with a gentle countenance, and encourage them to make offerings to the Dharma teacher with various offering articles.

original: 是王爾時既勸化已，即生無量歡喜快樂，心懷悅豫倍復自勵，不生疲倦多作利益，於說法者倍生恭敬。
analyzed: 是王爾時既勸化已，即生無量歡喜快樂，心懷悅豫倍復自勵，不生疲倦多作利益，於說法者倍生恭敬。
translated: When the king has thus exhorted and transformed, he will immediately give rise to immeasurable joy and happiness. With a joyful mind, he will redouble his self-encouragement, not giving rise to fatigue, but creating much benefit. He will give rise to even more respect for the expounder of the Dharma.

original: 」爾時佛告四天大王：
analyzed: 」爾時佛告四天大王：
translated: At that time, the Buddha said to the Four Heavenly Kings:

original: 「爾時人王，應著白淨鮮潔之衣，種種纓絡齊整莊嚴，執持素白微妙上蓋，服飾容儀不失常則，躬出奉迎說法之人。
analyzed: 「爾時人王，應著白淨鮮潔之衣，種種纓絡齊整莊嚴，執持素白微妙上蓋，服飾容儀不失常則，躬出奉迎說法之人。
translated: At that time, the king should wear pure and clean white clothes, with various adornments neatly arranged. He should hold a pure white, exquisite, and supreme parasol, and his attire and appearance should not depart from the usual standard. He should personally come out to welcome the expounder of the Dharma.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 是王如是隨其舉足步步之中，即是供養值遇百千億那由他諸佛世尊；
analyzed: 是王如是隨其舉足步步之中，即是供養值遇百千億那由他諸佛世尊；
translated: It is because when this king thus follows and raises his foot with each step, he is making offerings and encountering hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of buddhas.

original: 復得超越如是等劫生死之難；
analyzed: 復得超越如是等劫生死之難；
translated: He will also transcend such kalpas of birth and death.

original: 復於來世爾所劫中，常得封受轉輪王位；
analyzed: 復於來世爾所劫中，常得封受轉輪王位；
translated: In the future, for as many kalpas as there are, he will always obtain the position of a wheel-turning king.

original: 隨其步步亦得如是現世功德不可思議自在之力；
analyzed: 隨其步步亦得如是現世功德不可思議自在之力；
translated: With each step, he will also attain such inconceivable and majestic power in the present world.

original: 常得最勝極妙七寶人天宮殿；
analyzed: 常得最勝極妙七寶人天宮殿；
translated: They will always obtain the most supreme and wonderful palaces of the seven treasures of humans and gods;

original: 在在生處增益壽命；
analyzed: 在在生處增益壽命；
translated: Wherever they are born, their lifespans will be extended;

original: 言語辯了人所信用；
analyzed: 言語辯了人所信用；
translated: Their speech will be clear and people will believe and trust them;

original: 無所畏忌有大名稱；
analyzed: 無所畏忌有大名稱；
translated: They will be fearless and have great fame;

original: 常為人天之所恭敬，天上人中受上妙樂；
analyzed: 常為人天之所恭敬，天上人中受上妙樂；
translated: They will always be respected by humans and gods, and will experience the most wonderful bliss in the heavens and among humans;

original: 得大勢力具足威德；
analyzed: 得大勢力具足威德；
translated: They will obtain great power and be endowed with majestic virtue;

original: 身色微妙端嚴第一；
analyzed: 身色微妙端嚴第一；
translated: Their physical appearance will be subtle and wonderful, the most dignified and upright;

original: 常值諸佛遇善知識；
analyzed: 常值諸佛遇善知識；
translated: They will always encounter the buddhas and meet with good and virtuous friends;

original: 成就具足無量福聚。
analyzed: 成就具足無量福聚。
translated: They will accomplish and be endowed with immeasurable merit and virtue.

original: 「汝等四天王！
analyzed: 「汝等四天王！
translated: You four heavenly kings!

original: 如是人王，見如是等種種無量功德利益，是故此王應當躬出奉迎法師；
analyzed: 如是人王，見如是等種種無量功德利益，是故此王應當躬出奉迎法師；
translated: This king, seeing such various immeasurable merits and benefits, therefore this king should personally go out to welcome the Dharma teacher;

original: 若一由旬至百千由旬，於說法師應生佛想，應作是念：
analyzed: 若一由旬至百千由旬，於說法師應生佛想，應作是念：
translated: If it is one yojana to a hundred thousand yojanas, he should give rise to the thought of the Buddha towards the Dharma teacher and think like this:

original: 『今日釋迦如來正智，入於我宮受我供養，為我說法，我聞是法，即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已為得值百千萬億那由他佛，已為供養過去未來現在諸佛，已得畢竟三惡道苦。
analyzed: 『今日釋迦如來正智，入於我宮受我供養，為我說法，我聞是法，即不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，已為得值百千萬億那由他佛，已為供養過去未來現在諸佛，已得畢竟三惡道苦。
translated: 'Today, Shakyamuni Tathagata's right wisdom entered my palace, accepted my offerings, spoke the Dharma for me, and when I heard this Dharma, I immediately did not regress from supreme, perfect enlightenment. I have already encountered hundreds of thousands of myriads of kotis of nayutas of Buddhas, have already made offerings to past, future, and present Buddhas, and have already attained the ultimate suffering of the three evil destinies.

original: 我今已種百千無量轉輪聖王釋梵之因，已種無邊善根種子，已令無量百千萬億諸眾生等度於生死，已集無量無邊福聚，後宮眷屬已得擁護，宮宅諸衰悉已消滅，國土無有怨賊棘刺，他方怨敵不能侵陵。
analyzed: 我今已種百千無量轉輪聖王釋梵之因，已種無邊善根種子，已令無量百千萬億諸眾生等度於生死，已集無量無邊福聚，後宮眷屬已得擁護，宮宅諸衰悉已消滅，國土無有怨賊棘刺，他方怨敵不能侵陵。
translated: I have now planted the causes for becoming a wheel-turning sage king, Shakra, and Brahma hundreds of thousands of times, have already planted the seeds of boundless wholesome roots, have already caused hundreds of thousands of myriads of kotis of sentient beings to cross over birth and death, have already accumulated immeasurable and boundless blessings, and the inner palace and retinue have already been protected. The misfortunes of the palace have all been eliminated, and there are no enemies or thorns in the country. Other hostile forces cannot invade.'

original: 』「汝等四王！
analyzed: 』「汝等四王！
translated: You four kings!

original: 如是人王，應作如是供養正法，清淨聽受是妙經典，及恭敬供養尊重讚歎持是經典四部之眾；
analyzed: 如是人王，應作如是供養正法，清淨聽受是妙經典，及恭敬供養尊重讚歎持是經典四部之眾；
translated: Such a king should make offerings to the true Dharma in this way, listen to and accept this wonderful sutra, and respectfully make offerings to and praise the four groups of people who uphold this sutra;

translated: Accumulating such wholesome merits and virtues, he will always attain immeasurable, boundless, inconceivable, and sovereign benefits in this life, and will be fully endowed with the power and influence of majestic virtue, and will be able to subdue all evils with the true Dharma.

original: 」爾時四王白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時四王白佛言：

analyzed: 若未來世有諸人王，作如是等恭敬正法，至心聽受是妙經典，及恭敬供養尊重讚歎持是經典四部之眾，嚴治舍宅香汁灑地，專心正念聽說法時，我等四王亦當在中共聽此法，願諸人王為自利故，以己所得功德少分施與我等。
translated: If in the future there are kings who make such offerings to the true Dharma, who listen to this wonderful sutra with utmost sincerity, and who respectfully make offerings to and praise the four groups of people who uphold this sutra, and if they thoroughly clean their abodes, sprinkle the ground with fragrant water, and single-mindedly listen to the Dharma with right mindfulness, then we, the Four Heavenly Kings, will also be there listening to this Dharma together. We wish that for the sake of their own benefit, the kings will bestow a small portion of the merit they have attained upon us.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是諸人王於說法者所坐之處，為我等故燒種種香供養是經，是妙香氣，於一念頃即至我等諸天宮殿，其香即時變成香蓋，其香微妙金色晃耀照我等宮釋宮梵宮。
analyzed: 是諸人王於說法者所坐之處，為我等故燒種種香供養是經，是妙香氣，於一念頃即至我等諸天宮殿，其香即時變成香蓋，其香微妙金色晃耀照我等宮釋宮梵宮。
translated: For the sake of us, these kings will burn various kinds of incense at the place where the Dharma is expounded as an offering to this sutra. The wonderful fragrance will instantly reach our heavenly palaces. original: 「『善男子！

translated: Because I respect and think of this king, and also see the immeasurable benefits of merit, the four of us kings and the innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of millions of ghosts and spirits in the retinue, when we see these various fragrant smoke cloud canopies and auspicious signs in our own palaces, we will then conceal our bodies and not appear, in order to listen to the Dharma, we will go to the palace where the king is expounding the Dharma.

translated: Mahābrahmā, Śakra Devānām Indra, the god of great eloquence, the god of merit, the earth goddess Sthāvarā, the ghost-spirit Saṃjīva, the great generals and so forth, the twenty-eight divisions of ghost-spirit generals, Maheśvara, Vajrapāṇi, the ghost-spirit general Maṇibhadra, Hāritī the mother of ghosts with her five hundred sons, surrounded on all sides, the dragon kings Anavatapta and Sāgara, and countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of nayutas of ghost-spirits and gods, such a multitude, in order to listen to the Dharma, all concealed themselves and did not appear, going to the palace where the Dharma was being expounded for that king.

analyzed: 「世尊！

analyzed: 我等四王及餘眷屬無量鬼神，悉當同心以是人王為善知識，同共一行善相應行，能為無上大法施主，以甘露味充足我等；
translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings and the rest of our retinue, countless ghost-spirits, will all be of the same mind, regarding that king as a good and virtuous friend, together engaging in the same wholesome and harmonious practices, able to be the unsurpassed great Dharma donor, satisfying us with the taste of nectar;

original: 我等應當擁護是王，除其衰患令得安隱，及其宮宅國土城邑，諸惡災患悉令消滅。

translated: We should protect this king, remove his misfortunes and afflictions, and bring him peace and security, as well as to his palace, country, city, and all the evil calamities and afflictions, causing them to be completely eliminated.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

translated: If there are those from the four groups of Buddhist followers who uphold, recite, lecture on, and explain it, he is also unable to respectfully make offerings, revere, praise, and extol them.

translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings, and the immeasurable ghosts and spirits of the other retinues, will then be unable to hear this true Dharma, turn our backs on the flavor of nectar, lose the great benefits of the Dharma, have no power and authority, reduce the number of heavenly beings, and increase the evil realms.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings, and the immeasurable ghosts and spirits, will abandon our countries. Not only will we do so, but also the immeasurable old good spirits who guard the countries will all leave.

analyzed: 我等諸王及諸鬼神既捨離已，其國當有種種災異，一切人民失其善心，唯有繫縛瞋恚鬪諍，互相破壞多諸疾疫，彗星現怪流星崩落，五星諸宿違失常度，兩日並現日月薄蝕，白黑惡虹數數出現，大地震動發大音聲，暴風惡雨無日不有，穀米勇貴饑饉凍餓，多有他方怨賊侵掠其國，人民多受苦惱，其地無有可愛樂處。
translated: If we, the various kings and spirits, abandon it, the country will have various calamities and anomalies. original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我等四王及諸無量百千鬼神，并守國土諸舊善神，遠離去時生如是等無量惡事。

translated: When we, the Four Heavenly Kings, and the innumerable hundreds of thousands of spirits, as well as the old good spirits who guard the country, leave, such immeasurable bad things will happen.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

translated: If there are human kings who wish to protect themselves and their kingdoms, to experience much peace and happiness, to cause all sentient beings in their kingdoms to attain complete bliss, to subdue all external enemies, to protect all kingdoms, to righteously govern their lands with the true Dharma, and to eliminate the fears of sentient beings,

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！

analyzed: 是人王等，應當必定聽是經典，及恭敬供養讀誦受持是經典者。
translated: These human kings and others should definitely listen to this sutra and respectfully make offerings to those who read, recite, and uphold this sutra.

original: 我等四王及無量鬼神，以是法食善根因緣，得服甘露無上法味，增長身力心進勇銳增益諸天。
analyzed: 我等四王及無量鬼神，以是法食善根因緣，得服甘露無上法味，增長身力心進勇銳增益諸天。
translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings and innumerable spirits, by the causes and conditions of the wholesome roots of this Dharma food, will be able to partake of the unsurpassed sweet dew of the Dharma, increase our physical strength, enhance our mental vigor and courage, and benefit the gods.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 以是人王至心聽受是經典故，如諸梵天說出欲論、釋提桓因種種善論、五通之人神仙之論。

translated: Because these human kings listen to and accept this sutra with utmost sincerity, it is like the Brahma Heaven speaking of the discourse on transcending desires, Sakra Devendra expounding various wholesome discourses, and the five-powered ones expounding the discourses of the divine immortals.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 梵天釋提桓因五神通人，雖有百千億那由他無量勝論，是金光明於中最勝。
analyzed: 梵天釋提桓因五神通人，雖有百千億那由他無量勝論，是金光明於中最勝。
translated: Brahma Heaven, Śakra Devānām-Indra, and the five supernormal powers, although there are hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of immeasurable excellent teachings, this Golden Light is the most supreme among them.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 如來說是《金光明經》，為眾生故，為令一切閻浮提內諸人王等以正法治，為與一切眾生安樂，為欲愛護一切眾生，欲令眾生無諸苦惱，無有他方怨賊棘刺，所有諸惡背而不向，欲令國土無有憂惱，以正法教無有諍訟，是故人王各於國土，應然法炬熾然正法增益天眾。
analyzed: 如來說是《金光明經》，為眾生故，為令一切閻浮提內諸人王等以正法治，為與一切眾生安樂，為欲愛護一切眾生，欲令眾生無諸苦惱，無有他方怨賊棘刺，所有諸惡背而不向，欲令國土無有憂惱，以正法教無有諍訟，是故人王各於國土，應然法炬熾然正法增益天眾。
translated: The Tathāgata speaks this Golden Light Sūtra for the sake of sentient beings, in order to cause all the kings of Jambudvīpa to rule with the right Dharma, to bring peace and happiness to all sentient beings, to protect all sentient beings, to cause sentient beings to be free from suffering and distress, to prevent foreign enemies and troubles, to cause all evils to turn away and not face them, to cause the country to be free from worries and distress, to teach with the right Dharma without disputes or litigation. Therefore, the kings of humans should each light the torch of Dharma in their lands, blaze the right Dharma, and increase the heavenly multitudes.

original: 我等四王及無量鬼神、閻浮提內諸天善神，以是因緣，得服甘露法味充足，得大威德進力具足，閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛安樂其處；
analyzed: 我等四王及無量鬼神、閻浮提內諸天善神，以是因緣，得服甘露法味充足，得大威德進力具足，閻浮提內安隱豐樂，人民熾盛安樂其處；
translated: We, the Four Heavenly Kings and innumerable spirits, and the celestial good spirits within Jambudvīpa, by virtue of this cause and condition, will be able to enjoy the sufficient sweet dew of the Dharma flavor, obtain great majestic virtue, and be fully endowed with the power of progress. Within Jambudvīpa, it will be peaceful, prosperous, and joyful, with the people flourishing and happy in that place;

original: 復於來世無量百千不可思議那由他劫，常受微妙第一快樂，復得值遇無量諸佛種諸善根，然後證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 復於來世無量百千不可思議那由他劫，常受微妙第一快樂，復得值遇無量諸佛種諸善根，然後證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: Furthermore, in the future, for innumerable hundreds of thousands of inconceivable nayutas of kalpas, we will constantly experience the most wonderful and supreme happiness, and will again encounter innumerable Buddhas and plant various wholesome roots, after which we will realize supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 得如是等無量功德，悉是如來正遍知說，如來過於百千億那由他諸梵天等，以大悲力故，亦過無量百千億那由他釋提桓因，以苦行力故。
analyzed: 得如是等無量功德，悉是如來正遍知說，如來過於百千億那由他諸梵天等，以大悲力故，亦過無量百千億那由他釋提桓因，以苦行力故。
translated: Obtaining such immeasurable merits and virtues, all of this is spoken by the Tathāgata, the One of Perfect Knowledge. The Tathāgata surpasses hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of Brahmā Heavens by the power of great compassion, and also surpasses innumerable hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of nayutas of Śakra Devānām-Indras by the power of ascetic practice.

original: 是故如來為諸眾生，演說如是《金光明經》。
analyzed: 是故如來為諸眾生，演說如是《金光明經》。

analyzed: 若閻浮提一切眾生及諸人王，世間出世間所作國事，所造世論皆因此經。

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！

translated: If there are people who can widely spread and disseminate such a wonderful sutra, performing great buddha-work among humans and gods, and greatly benefiting innumerable beings, such people, you four kings, must protect them and not allow other conditions to disturb them, causing their minds to be tranquil and happy, and then they will continue to be able to widely spread this sutra.

analyzed: 欲令豐盛，　　應當至心，　　淨潔洗浴，

analyzed: 是諸眾生得是威德大勢力已，能供養是《金光明經》，及恭敬供養持是經者四部之眾。
translated: These sentient beings, having attained such majestic power and strength, will be able to make offerings to the Golden Light Sūtra and respectfully make offerings to the fourfold assembly who uphold this sūtra.

original: 我於爾時當往其所，為諸眾生受快樂故，請說法者廣令宣布如是妙典。
analyzed: 我於爾時當往其所，為諸眾生受快樂故，請說法者廣令宣布如是妙典。
translated: At that time, I will go to their place and, for the sake of sentient beings experiencing happiness, I will request the Dharma teachers to widely proclaim this wonderful sūtra.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是金光明若廣說時，我及眷屬所得功德倍過於常，增長身力心進勇銳。
analyzed: 是金光明若廣說時，我及眷屬所得功德倍過於常，增長身力心進勇銳。
translated: When the Golden Light is widely expounded, I and my retinue will attain merits and virtues that are twice the usual, increasing bodily strength and invigorating the mind.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我服甘露無上味已，閻浮提地縱廣七千由旬豐壤倍常。
analyzed: 我服甘露無上味已，閻浮提地縱廣七千由旬豐壤倍常。
translated: After I have consumed the unsurpassed flavor of the sweet dew, the ground of Jambudvīpa, seven thousand yojanas long and wide, will be twice as fertile as usual.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 如是大地眾生所依，悉能增長一切所須之物，增長一切所須物已，令諸眾生隨意所用受於快樂——種種飲食衣服臥具、宮殿屋宅樹木林苑、河池井泉，如是等物依因於地悉皆具足。
analyzed: 如是大地眾生所依，悉能增長一切所須之物，增長一切所須物已，令諸眾生隨意所用受於快樂——種種飲食衣服臥具、宮殿屋宅樹木林苑、河池井泉，如是等物依因於地悉皆具足。
translated: In this way, the great earth is the support for sentient beings and is able to increase all necessary things. Having increased all necessary things, it allows sentient beings to use them as they wish and experience happiness - various kinds of food and drink, clothing, bedding, palaces, houses, trees, groves, rivers, ponds, wells, springs, and so forth. Such things are all complete, relying on the earth.

original: 是故，世尊！
analyzed: 是故，世尊！
translated: Therefore, World-Honored One!

original: 是諸眾生為知我恩，應作是念：
analyzed: 是諸眾生為知我恩，應作是念：
translated: These sentient beings, in order to know my kindness, should think like this:

original: 『我當必定聽受是經，供養恭敬尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 『我當必定聽受是經，供養恭敬尊重讚歎。
translated: 'I will definitely listen to and accept this sutra, make offerings, respect, honor, and praise it.'

original: 』作是念已，即從住處，若城邑聚落舍宅空地，往法會所聽受是經。
analyzed: 』作是念已，即從住處，若城邑聚落舍宅空地，往法會所聽受是經。
translated: Having had this thought, they will then leave their dwelling places, whether cities, towns, villages, houses, or open spaces, and go to the Dharma assembly to listen to and accept this sutra.

original: 既聽受已還其所止，各應相慶作如是言：
analyzed: 既聽受已還其所止，各應相慶作如是言：
translated: Having listened to and accepted it, they will return to their abodes and should rejoice with each other, saying such words:

original: 『我等今者聞此甚深無上妙法，已為攝取不可思議功德之聚，值遇無量無邊諸佛，三惡道報已得解脫，於未來世常生天上人中受樂。
analyzed: 『我等今者聞此甚深無上妙法，已為攝取不可思議功德之聚，值遇無量無邊諸佛，三惡道報已得解脫，於未來世常生天上人中受樂。
translated: 'We now, having heard this most profound and unsurpassed wondrous Dharma, have already taken up an inconceivable aggregate of merit and virtue, encountered immeasurable and boundless buddhas, and attained liberation from the retributions of the three evil destinies. In future lives, we will always be reborn in the heavens and among humans to experience happiness.'

original: 』是諸眾生各於住處，若為他人演說是經，若說一喻一品一緣，若復稱歎一佛一菩薩一四句偈乃至一句，及稱是經首題名字。
analyzed: 』是諸眾生各於住處，若為他人演說是經，若說一喻一品一緣，若復稱歎一佛一菩薩一四句偈乃至一句，及稱是經首題名字。
translated: These sentient beings, each in their own dwelling place, if for the sake of others they expound this sūtra, if they speak of a single simile, a single chapter, a single cause and condition, or if they praise a single buddha, a single bodhisattva, a single four-line verse, or even a single line, and the title of this sūtra,

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 隨是眾生所住之處，其地具足豐壤肥濃過於餘地，凡是因地所生之物，悉得增長滋茂廣大，令諸眾生受於快樂，多饒財寶好行惠施，心常堅固深信三寶。
analyzed: 隨是眾生所住之處，其地具足豐壤肥濃過於餘地，凡是因地所生之物，悉得增長滋茂廣大，令諸眾生受於快樂，多饒財寶好行惠施，心常堅固深信三寶。
translated: Wherever these sentient beings dwell, the earth there will be replete with fertile and nourishing soil surpassing other places. All the things that grow from the earth will increase, flourish, and expand greatly, causing sentient beings to experience happiness, be replete with wealth and treasures, and readily practice generosity. Their minds will always be firm and deeply believe in the Three Jewels.

original: 」爾時佛告地神堅牢：
analyzed: 」爾時佛告地神堅牢：
translated: At that time, the Buddha said to the Earth Deity Firm and Solid:

original: 「若有眾生，乃至聞是《金光明經》一句之義，人中命終隨意往生三十三天。
analyzed: 「若有眾生，乃至聞是《金光明經》一句之義，人中命終隨意往生三十三天。
translated: If there are sentient beings who hear even a single phrase of this Suvarṇa-prabhāsa Sūtra, after their life ends in the human realm, they will be reborn in the Heaven of the Thirty-three according to their wishes.

original: 地神！
analyzed: 地神！
translated: Earth God!

original: 若有眾生，為欲供養是經典故莊嚴屋宅，乃至張懸一幡一蓋及以一衣，欲界六天已有自然七寶宮殿，是人命終即往生彼。
analyzed: 若有眾生，為欲供養是經典故莊嚴屋宅，乃至張懸一幡一蓋及以一衣，欲界六天已有自然七寶宮殿，是人命終即往生彼。
translated: If there are sentient beings who, in order to make offerings to this sūtra, adorn their dwellings, and even hang up a single banner, a single canopy, or a single piece of clothing, in the six heavens of the desire realm, there will already be naturally-occurring palaces made of the seven treasures. When these people's lives end, they will be reborn there.

original: 地神！
analyzed: 地神！
translated: Earth God!

original: 於諸七寶宮殿之中，各各自然有七天女共相娛樂，日夜常受不可思議微妙快樂。
analyzed: 於諸七寶宮殿之中，各各自然有七天女共相娛樂，日夜常受不可思議微妙快樂。
translated: Within each of the palaces made of the seven treasures, there will naturally be seven celestial maidens who will accompany them in entertainment. Day and night they will constantly experience inconceivable subtle bliss.

original: 」爾時地神白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時地神白佛言：
translated: At that time, the Earth God addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 以是因緣，說法比丘坐法座時，我常晝夜衛護不離，隱蔽其形在法座下頂戴其足。
analyzed: 以是因緣，說法比丘坐法座時，我常晝夜衛護不離，隱蔽其形在法座下頂戴其足。
translated: For these causes and conditions, when the Dharma-preaching bhikṣus sit on the Dharma seat, I will always guard and protect them day and night without leaving, concealing my form beneath the Dharma seat, supporting their feet with my head.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典令不斷絕。
analyzed: 若有眾生於百千佛所種諸善根，是說法者為是等故，於閻浮提廣宣流布是妙經典令不斷絕。
translated: If there are sentient beings who have planted various roots of goodness in the presence of hundreds of thousands of buddhas, this expounder of the Dharma will, for their sake, widely proclaim and spread this wonderful sūtra in Jambudvīpa, causing it to continue without interruption.

original: 是諸眾生聽是經已，未來之世無量百千那由他劫，於天上人中常受快樂，值遇諸佛，疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉斷無餘。
analyzed: 是諸眾生聽是經已，未來之世無量百千那由他劫，於天上人中常受快樂，值遇諸佛，疾成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，三惡道苦悉斷無餘。
translated: After these sentient beings have listened to this sūtra, for innumerable hundreds of thousands of koṭīs of kalpas in the future, they will constantly experience happiness among humans and gods, encounter the buddhas, quickly attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and completely eradicate the sufferings of the three evil destinies without remainder.Here is the corrected and aligned text:

analyzed: 」金光明經卷第二
